passive.name: DEADLY VENOM
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) DEADLY VENOM
                                Attacks infect enemies with venom, dealing 1/2/3/4/5 true damage (1/4/7/10/13  + 2.5% ) over 5 seconds and stacking up to 5 times.When an enemy champion has full stacks of DEADLY VENOM, Twitch gains 30% Attack Speed  for 5 seconds.Monsters take 130% increased damage from DEADLY VENOM.

q.name: (Q) AMBUSH
q.description:
(Q) AMBUSH
 15s   40 
                                
                                
                                Become Camouflaged and hasted by 10% for 8/9/10/11 seconds, increasing to 20% when nearby enemy champions cannot see Twitch.After exiting Camouflage, Twitch's attacks will apply an additional stack of DEADLY VENOM for 3 seconds. AMBUSH resets when a champion dies while infected by DEADLY VENOM.Camouflage: Hide from champions by keeping them outside Twitch's detection radius. Attacks and offensive abilities and Camouflage early.

w.name: (W) VENOM CASK
w.description:
(W) VENOM CASK
 12s   70 
                                
                                
                                Hurls a cask that applies stacks of DEADLY VENOM to enemies and slows them for 30% (30/35/40/45% + 6% bonus ) for 3 seconds.Cast time decreases Twitch's attack speed.

e.name: (E) CONTAMINATE
e.description:
(E) CONTAMINATE
 16/15/14/13s   50/60/70/80 
                                
                                
                                Deals 25/35/45/55 physical damage to all enemies affected by DEADLY VENOM, each stack deals 20 damage (20/25/30/35 + 30% bonus  + 18% ) to enemies.Enemies with maximum stacks will spread the damage to nearby targets and  apply maximum stacks of DEADLY VENOM to them.Deals 130 physical damage at max stacks.Deals 80% increased damage to monsters.

r.name: (R) SPRAY AND PRAY
r.description:
(R) SPRAY AND PRAY
 80/70/60s   100 
                                
                                
                                For 6 seconds gain 250 Attack Range and 20/35/50 bonus attack damage and transform attacks into piercing bolts that hit every enemy in a line.Subsequent targets take 15% less damage, down to a minimum of 40%.
notes: Range and 20/35/50 bonus attack damage and transform attacks into piercing bolts that hit every enemy in a line

situational_items_detailed.name: Blade Of The Ruined King
situational_items_detailed.description: Details for Blade Of The Ruined King

example_build_detailed.name: Blade Of The Ruined King
example_build_detailed.description: Details for Blade Of The Ruined King

Core item for critical strike-based marksmen. Provides high attack damage and critical strike chance while amplifying critical strike damage. Essential for ADCs who want to maximize their late-game damage potential.

runes_detailed.name: Coup de Grace
runes_detailed.description: Rune effect for Coup de Grace
After taking damage from an enemy champion, the next 3 spells or attacks you receive from them deal reduced damage.
